issue.title: [R] Implement dplyr::arrange()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11703](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11703). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Only for Table/RecordBatch for now. There are sorting functions in the compute module now (https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/compute.html#sorts-and-partitions) and I think they have Python bindings already.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11703?focusedCommentId=17309083) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9745
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9745>
